verses.verse: But there shall be no more <S%H4155>gloom<s%> for her who was in <S%H4164>anguish.<s%> <S%H6256>In<s%> the former <S%H7223>time,<s%> he brought into <S%H7043>contempt<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali;<s%> but in the <S%H314>latter<s%> time he has made it <S%H3513>glorious,<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> <S%H1551>Galilee<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

The <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H1980>walked<s%> in <S%H2822>darkness<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H216>light.<s%> Those who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the shadow of <S%H6757>death,<s%> on them the <S%H216>light<s%> has <S%H5050>shined.<s%>

You have <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> the <S%H1471>nation.<s%> You have <S%H1431>increased<s%> their <S%H8057>joy.<s%> They <S%H8057>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you according to the <S%H8057>joy<s%> in <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> as men <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> when they <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil.<s%>

For the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of his <S%H5448>burden,<s%> and the <S%H4294>staff<s%> of his <S%H7926>shoulder,<s%> the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of his <S%H5065>oppressor,<s%> you have <S%H2865>broken<s%> as in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian.<s%>

For all the <S%H5430>armor<s%> of the armed <S%H5431>man<s%> in the <S%H7494>noisy<s%> <S%H8071>battle,<s%> and the garments <S%H1556>rolled<s%> in <S%H1818>blood,<s%> will be for <S%H8316>burning,<s%> <S%H3980>fuel<s%> for the <S%H784>fire.<s%>

For to us a <S%H3206>child<s%> is <S%H3205>born.<s%> To us a <S%H1121>son<s%> is <S%H5414>given;<s%> and the <S%H4951>government<s%> will be on his <S%H7926>shoulders.<s%> His <S%H8034>name<s%> will be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H6382>Wonderful,<s%> <S%H3289>Counselor,<s%> <S%H1368>Mighty<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H5703>Everlasting<s%> <S%H1>Father,<s%> <S%H8269>Prince<s%> of <S%H7965>Peace.<s%>

Of the <S%H4766>increase<s%> of his <S%H4951>government<s%> and of <S%H7965>peace<s%> there shall be no <S%H7093>end,<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> and on his <S%H4467>kingdom,<s%> to <S%H3559>establish<s%> <S%H4941>it,<s%> and to uphold it with <S%H4941>justice<s%> and with <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> from that time <S%H5704>on,<s%> even <S%H5769>forever.<s%> The <S%H7068>zeal<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> will perform <S%H6213>this.<s%>
The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> into <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and it <S%H5307>falls<s%> on <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

All the <S%H5971>people<s%> will <S%H3045>know,<s%> including <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> who <S%H559>say<s%> in <S%H1346>pride<s%> and in <S%H1346>arrogance<s%> of <S%H3824>heart,<s%>

"The <S%H3843>bricks<s%> have <S%H5307>fallen,<s%> but we will <S%H1129>build<s%> with cut <S%H1496>stone.<s%> The <S%H8256>sycamore<s%> fig trees have been cut <S%H1438>down,<s%> but we will put <S%H730>cedars<s%> in their <S%H2498>place.<s%>"
Therefore <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will set <S%H7682>up<s%> on high against him the <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> of <S%H7526>Rezin,<s%> and will <S%H5526>stir<s%> <S%H5526>up<s%> his <S%H341>enemies,<s%>

The <S%H758>Syrians<s%> in <S%H6924>front,<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H268>behind;<s%> and they will <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with open <S%H6310>mouth.<s%> For all <S%H639>this,<s%> his anger is not turned <S%H7725>away,<s%> but his <S%H3027>hand<s%> is stretched out <S%H5186>still.<s%>
Yet the <S%H5971>people<s%> have not <S%H7725>turned<s%> to him who <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H1875>them,<s%> neither have they sought <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%> and <S%H2180>tail,<s%> palm <S%H3712>branch<s%> and <S%H100>reed,<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
The <S%H2205>elder<s%> and the <S%H6440>honorable<s%> <S%H1931>man<s%> is the <S%H7218>head,<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> who <S%H3384>teaches<s%> <S%H8267>lies<s%> is the <S%H2180>tail.<s%>
For those who <S%H833>lead<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%> lead them <S%H8582>astray;<s%> and those who are <S%H833>led<s%> by them are <S%H1104>destroyed.<s%>

Therefore the <S%H136>Lord<s%> will not <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> over their young <S%H970>men,<s%> neither will he have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on their <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> and <S%H490>widows;<s%> for everyone is <S%H2611>profane<s%> and an <S%H7489>evildoer,<s%> and every <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H1696>speaks<s%> <S%H5039>folly.<s%> For all this his <S%H639>anger<s%> is not turned <S%H7725>away,<s%> but his <S%H3027>hand<s%> is stretched out <S%H5186>still.<s%>

For <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> <S%H1197>burns<s%> like a <S%H784>fire.<s%> It <S%H398>devours<s%> the <S%H8068>briers<s%> and <S%H7898>thorns;<s%> <S%H3341>yes,<s%> it kindles in the <S%H5442>thickets<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest,<s%> and they roll <S%H55>upward<s%> in a <S%H1348>column<s%> of <S%H6227>smoke.<s%>

Through the <S%H5678>wrath<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H6272>burnt<s%> <S%H5971>up;<s%> and the people are the <S%H3980>fuel<s%> for the <S%H784>fire.<s%> No <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H2550>spares<s%> his <S%H251>brother.<s%>

One will <S%H1504>devour<s%> on the right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and be <S%H7457>hungry;<s%> and he will <S%H398>eat<s%> on the left <S%H8040>hand,<s%> and they will not be <S%H7646>satisfied.<s%> <S%H376>Everyone<s%> will <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of his own <S%H2220>arm:<s%>

<S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim;<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh;<s%> and they <S%H3162>together<s%> shall be against <S%H3063>Judah.<s%> For all this his <S%H639>anger<s%> is not turned <S%H7725>away,<s%> but his <S%H3027>hand<s%> is stretched out <S%H5186>still.<s%>
